layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x275
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x275
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x251
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 170x19
          text run at (0,0) width 170: "COL VALIGN=MIDDLE"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,36) size 707x215 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0

          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 705x209
